actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice

official_title: To increase the penalties applicable for transporting or importing goods made by convicts or prisoners, and for failure to mark packages of goods made by convicts or prisoners, and for other purposes.
short_title: Convict Labor Penalties Enhancement Act of 1992

summary.text: Convict Labor Penalties Enhancement Act of 1992 - Increases penalties for: (1) transporting or importing goods made by convicts or prisoners; and (2) failure to mark packages of such goods.

titles.title: Convict Labor Penalties Enhancement Act of 1992

To increase the penalties applicable for transporting or importing goods made by convicts or prisoners, and for failure to mark packages of goods made by convicts or prisoners, and for other purposes.
